Action.author: bestbeforetoday
Action.body: I thinkÂ FABN-1332|https://jira.hyperledger.org/browse/FABN-1332 will have decoupled these two settings. If/when the commit event handling reverts to using the high level eventing API again, this issue needs to be considered.

Action.author: davidkel
Action.body: ~bestbeforetoday so if this is fixed now should this jira be withdrawn ?

Action.author: davidkel
Action.body: Moved to done as suggested that this has already been fixed by another jira
